players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Diana is dead. We need to share info carefully. Alice, Charlie, any thoughts?"
You: "Diana's death is tragic. Bob, why are you singling Alice and me out? That feels suspicious."
You: "Bob, your attempt to direct attention to specific players is concerning. Why not share your own thoughts first instead of probing others?"
Bob: "I am not mafia. Alice, you are deflecting. Why attack me for asking for thoughts? Charlie, speak up."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
